backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing a text update requirement for a specific paragraph in frontend/src/App.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for several frontend components and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH color variables and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling question, accepted, and declined states with heart animations and evasive 'No' button behavior.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationHeart: Component that continuously generates floating heart animations across the screen.
frontend/src/components/HeartBurst.tsx: Component rendering a radial burst of animated hearts at a given coordinate.
Layout wrapper providing a styled centered card container for the app content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor using Internet Identity and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and state in React.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind styles plus custom animations and color variables for the Valentine's-themed UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing query client and identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining themes, extended colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an ICP fullâ€‘stack starter app with Motoko backend, React/Tailwind frontend, and a set of defined interactive and UI features.
